item.title: Civil defence preparedness exercise at Raichur Thermal Power Station
item.description:
<![CDATA[A civil defence preparedness exercise simulating wartime emergency and disaster scenario was conducted on Friday evening at the helipad located within the premises of the Raichur Thermal Power Station (RTPS).
The mock drill was aimed at assessing and strengthening coordination between civil defence personnel and armed forces during crisis situations.
